original_text: So the master sent other servants to go to the farmers. He sent more servants than the first time. But the farmers did the same thing to those servants too.
korean_text: 다시 다른 종들을 처음보다 많이 보내니 그들에게도 그렇게 하였는지라

sentences.original_text: So the master sent other servants
He sent more servants than the first time
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 첫 번째 때보다 더 많은 종들을 보냈다

sentences.original_text: But the farmers did the same thing
